bioconda.name: bioconductor-sangerseqr
bioconda.summary: Tools for Sanger Sequencing Data in R

biotools.summary: This package contains several tools for analyzing Sanger Sequencing data files in R, including reading .scf and .ab1 files, making basecalls and plotting chromatograms.

bioschemas.name: sangerseqR
bioschemas.summary: This package contains several tools for analyzing Sanger Sequencing data files in R, including reading .scf and .ab1 files, making basecalls and plotting chromatograms.
